resources.string: After logging into your vivo account, you can use cloud services, view the phone, and enjoy better experiences and services in iTheme, the app store and the game center.
Your phone has been set up \n EasyShare is recommended for transferring data from the old phone
Join the user experience improvement plan

Recording your usage of this product will help improve the product and associated services, thereby offering you an even better usage experience. The whole procedure is in compliance with the privacy policy at all times.
Auto download when in a WLAN network
\"Service Location\" allow \"Map\" and other applications using the wireless network to collect and use your location information, colleagues may generate network traffic。

For you to enjoy a better and more professional user experience, some system apps require the Internet, location services or other functions, including:

 1.Automatic time synchronization, auto update check, location services, standby screen, electronic warranty, app installation, and Lockscreen Poster require the Internet.

 2.vivo services and device management require the Internet and location services.
Allow Map, vivo services, Device Manager and other apps to use your location information.
Smart Upgrade will select an appropriate time to automatically download upgrade patches and carry out intelligent installation over WLAN.
After disabling Smart Upgrade, you need to manually confirm when upgrading to a new version to complete the upgrade. Are you sure you want to disable?

For you to enjoy a better and more professional user experience, some system apps require the Internet, location services or other functions, including:

 1. Automatic time synchronization, auto update check, location services, standby screen, electronic warranty, app installation, Lockscreen Poster service, the User Experience Improvement Program, and Smart Engine require the Internet.

 2.vivo services and device management require the Internet and location services.

 3.Easy Now can help you more efficiently manage your travels, living, and work, providing you with smart management, reminders,and other related services.

 When you use Easy Now, we will collect your device information (including IMEI, device model, version, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth messages) and your personal information (including your location, SMS, vivo account, app messages, and app usage behavior information).

 We will provide services like smart reminders and smart planning based on the collected information and data, as well as analyze your habits and preferences to provide you a personalized user experience.

 In order to run certain functions and to provide you with more quality services, we may provide some of the above information, after it has been processed, to third-party service providers to allow them to provide you services. This process requires Internet.

 If you are not using Easy Now, you can turn it off via the Easy Now switch.
Use EasyShare\'s one-key device transfer function to quickly import data (contacts, messages, photos, etc.) from your old phone to this phone data-free.
Swipe up in the three areas at the bottom of the interface to call up the control center, return to standby, and return to the previous interface.
Call up the background application list
Swipe up and stay in the middle area at the bottom of the interface to bring up the background application list.
